params._params: The struct containing the order parameters.
params.pm: The instance of the PositionManager contract.
params.primexDNS: The instance of the PrimexDNS contract.
params.traderBalanceVault: The instance of the TraderBalanceVault contract.

params.conditions: The array of Condition structs to be checked.

returns._0: bool Boolean value indicating whether the array has no duplicate manager types.

params._closeConditions: The Condition array containing close conditions for the position.
params._params: The OpenPositionParams calldata containing additional position parameters.
params.order: The LimitOrder storage containing order details.
params.pm: The instance of the PositionManager contract.
params.swapManager: The instance of the SwapManager contract.
params.traderBalanceVault: The instance of the TraderBalanceVault contract.

returns._0: vars The OpenPositionByOrderVars struct containing the result of the open position operation.

params.closeConditions: The array of close conditions to set.
params.closeConditionsMap: The mapping of order IDs to close conditions.

params.openConditionsMap: The mapping of order IDs to open conditions.
params.primexDNS: The instance of the Primex DNS contract.

params._amount: The amount of the asset being deposited.
params._takeDepositFromWallet: Boolean indicating whether to make a deposit or unlock the deposited asset.
params.traderBalanceVault: The instance of ITraderBalanceVault used for deposit and unlock operations.

params._leverage: The new leverage value in WAD format for the order.
params._primexDNS: The instance of the PrimexDNS contract

hasNoConditionManagerTypeDuplicates(Limi.notice: Checks if an array of Condition structs has no duplicate manager types.

setCloseConditions(LimitOrderLibrary.Lim.notice: Sets the close conditions for a LimitOrder.

setOpenConditions(LimitOrderLibrary.Limi.notice: Sets the open conditions for a LimitOrder.

updateDeposit(LimitOrderLibrary.LimitOrd.notice: Updates the deposit details of a LimitOrder.

updateLeverage(LimitOrderLibrary.LimitOr.notice: Updates the leverage of a limit order.
